name: Not So Brave
description:
You're a clumsy knight, you just got into Videl's tower, an evil sorcerer who kidnapped the Princess but...You realize you've left your backpack and your equipment at the local tavern the night before.

Don't worry! It will be up to you to help Erik in this crazy adventure, trying to turn the enemy attacks on themselves! Solve puzzles, plan your moves e and get to the top of the Tower!

The game includes:
-77 Unique Levels.
-5 Areas.
-Angel mode, to help you out in the hardest levels
-Unbelievably corny jokes from Videl

Enjoy!
